# Workshop: Introduction to GitHub

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This presentation is designed to introduce the basics of GitHub.

## Learning Objectives

- Understand what Git(Hub) is
- Create a GitHub account
- Create a new repository
- How to push and pull changes
